          Verte-breaker Sword
          titanium katanna

firepower:  7
Skill:  9

History:

Malice began his existance as an Autobot named Neutronics.  After 
being on a fringe world out post the entire Great War, he was able to 
travel and stay on Cybertron.  He was there for the Great Upgrade, 
when he met a femme named Organics.  Both were working at the same 
prison, both wardens, so they developed a bond that went beyond 
professional.  For reasons unknown, Organics disappeared suddenly, 
leaving Neutronics in agony.  He then became restless and became a 
bounty hunter, upgrading his power effecentcy close to Devcon, the 
great Autobot bounty hunter.  After years spent in such life he 
changed his name and alt. form for something more suitable.  Malice 
spends time now hunting a bounty, working on his swords or rifle.  Or 
practicing his hunting skills, becoming a ruthless hunter.
